briefdescription.para: Macro to define a gpio pin, start from 0.
Macro to define a gpio port, start from 0.
Macro to define a gpio port-pin(such as P0.0 or PA.0, start from 0.
Set the direction of masked bits of gpio port into input.

listitem.para: Param usage : 1 in each bit will be masked.

briefdescription.para: Set the direction of masked bits of gpio port into output.

listitem.para: Param usage : 1 in each bit will be masked.

briefdescription.para: Get gpio port direction.

listitem.para: Param usage : 1 bit for 1 bit of gpio port, 0 for input, 1 for output

briefdescription.para: Set gpio interrupt configuration for each bit.

listitem.para: Param usage : store gpio interrupt configuration for each bit.

briefdescription.para: Get gpio interrupt configuration for each bit.

listitem.para: Param usage : First set int_bit_mask in DEV_GPIO_INT_CFG structure to the mask of which bit of GPIO you want to get. And the interrupt configuration will be stored in the structure DEV_GPIO_INT_CFG, each bit stand for each bit of port.

briefdescription.para: Set gpio service routine for each bit.

listitem.para: Param usage : store gpio handler information for each bit, int handler's param will be DEV_GPIO *.

briefdescription.para: Get gpio service routine for each bit.

listitem.para: Param usage : By passing int_bit_ofs in DEV_GPIO_BIT_ISR, it will return interrupt handler for this bit and store it in int_bit_handler.

briefdescription.para: Enable gpio interrupt of the masked bits.

listitem.para: Param usage : 1 in each bit will be masked.

briefdescription.para: Disable gpio interrupt of the masked bits.

listitem.para: Param usage : 1 in each bit will be masked.

briefdescription.para: Get gpio interrupt enable status.

listitem.para: Param usage : 1 bit for 1 bit of gpio port, 0 for poll, 1 for interrupt

briefdescription.para: Toggle GPIO output of the masked bits(pins).

listitem.para: Param usage : 1 in each bit will be masked.

briefdescription.para: Mask none bits of the max 32bits.
Mask all bits of the max 32bits.
Level sensitive interrupt type for 1 bit.
Edge sensitive interrupt type for 1 bit.
Level sensitive interrupt type for all 32 bits.
Edge sensitive interrupt type for all 32 bits.
Set bit interrupt type of gpio into level sensitive.
Set bit interrupt type of gpio into edge sensitive.
Set interrupt type of masked bits of gpio into level sensitive.
Set bit interrupt type of gpio into edge sensitive.
Set bit polarity of gpio into active low.
Set bit polarity of gpio into active high.
Set bit polarity of gpio into falling edge.
Set bit polarity of gpio into rising edge.
Set polarity of masked bits of gpio into active low.
Set polarity of masked bits of gpio into active high.
Set polarity of masked bits of gpio into falling edge.
Set polarity of masked bits of gpio into rising edge.
Disable debounce circuitry for 1 bit.
Enable debounce circuitry for 1 bit.
Disable debounce circuitry for all bits.
Enable debounce circuitry for all bits.
Set bit interrupt debounce of gpio into enabled.
Set bit interrupt debounce of gpio into disabled.
Set bit interrupt debounce of gpio into enabled.
Set bit interrupt debounce of gpio into disabled.
Set extra information pointer of gpio info.
Get extra information pointer of gpio info.
Method of all gpio bits set to poll.
Method of all gpio bits set to interrupt.
Default method of all gpio bits should be poll for first open.
gpio pin defintions
gpio port defintions

detaileddescription.para: Active low for level-sensitive interrupt for 1 bit
Falling-edge for edge-sensitive interrupt for 1 bit
Active high for level-sensitive interrupt for 1 bit
Rising-edge for edge-sensitive interrupt for 1 bit
Active low for level-sensitive interrupt for all bits
Falling-edge for edge-sensitive interrupt for all bits
Active high for level-sensitive interrupt for all bits
Rising-edge for edge-sensitive interrupt for all bits

briefdescription.para: GPIO Interrupt polarity type enum.
gpio pin defintions
gpio port defintions
GPIO Interrupt polarity type enum.
GPIO interrupt configuration.
GPIO interrupt handler or Interrupt Service Routine(ISR)
interrupt handler for each port bit
gpio information struct definition

detaileddescription.para:
Informations about gpio open count, working status gpio registers and control block, gpio io direction and interrupt/poll for each bit of gpio
Only available for gpio with max 32bits

briefdescription.para: gpio device interface definition

detaileddescription.para:
Define gpio device interface, like gpio information structure, fuctions to open/close/control gpio, write or read data via gpio
All this details are implemented by user in user porting code

briefdescription.para: Default interrupt configuration for all gpio bits.
get an gpio device by gpio device id.

para.verbatim: For how to use gpio device hal refer to \ref dev_gpio "Functions in gpio device structure"

parameterdescription.para: id of gpio, defined by user
pointer to an gpio device structure
failed to find the gpio device by gpio_id

simplesect.para: Need to implemented by user in user code

briefdescription.para: gpio device hardware layer definitions

detaileddescription.para: Provide common definitions for gpio device, then the software developer can develop gpio driver following these definitions, and the applications can directly call this definition to realize functions
